subject: Coaches and Managers
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mike D’Antoni ranks with Phil Jackson and Gregg Popovich among the highest-paid N.B.A. coaches. They have won N.B.A. titles; D’Antoni has not.
snippet: Mike D’Antoni ranks with Phil Jackson and Gregg Popovich among the highest-paid N.B.A. coaches. They have won N.B.A. titles; D’Antoni has not.
